resources.string: It seems like you are just getting started.\n\nLet\'s learn how you can get the most of Chronotruck Driver!
Search freights using comprehensive filters and create custom searches for quick access!\n\nBook offers directly or make bids!
Get info on upcoming, ongoing or passed missions. \n\nUpdate mission\'s tracking, submit documents.
Configure Notifications and Location to get notified about new freight next to you and get help with your mission!
